About Me

I am a 4th year PhD Candidate in Claus Wilke's lab through the Ecology, Evolution, and Behavior graduate program at UT Austin. My CV (updated 11/20/14) is available here, and my research interests broadly encompass computational molecular evolution, protein evolution, and phylogenetics.
